mapper.select: SELECT id, prompt_name, prompt_content, description, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client_system_prompt ORDER BY id
mapper.update: UPDATE ai_client_system_prompt SET prompt_name = #{promptName}, prompt_content = #{promptContent}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.prompt_name, p.prompt_content, p.description, p.status, p.create_time, p.update_time FROM ai_client_system_prompt p WHERE p.id = ( SELECT prompt_id FROM ai_client_system_prompt_config WHERE client_id = #{clientId} LIMIT 1 )
